casebody.data:
Leonardo NOGUEIRA
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 29, 2016 Michael W. Brown, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Sarah Hanna, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Leonardo Nogueira's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 803 , 149 A.3d 983 (2016), is denied.
